title: Medico mastix, or, A pill for the doctor being a short reply to a late vindictive letter, sent to Mr. Vicars in the name of Doctor Bastwick, concerning Leiut. [sic] Coll. John Lilburn / by E.A., a she Presbiterian.
author: E. A., she Presbiterian.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
